mapper.insert: insert into IM_MODEL (PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, S_DS_ID, T_MD_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TYPE, BUILD_MODE, UPDATE_MODE, UPDATE_KEY) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tMdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{buildMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateKey,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update IM_MODEL set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_DS_ID = #{sDsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T_MD_ID = #{tMdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, BUILD_MODE = #{buildMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_MODE = #{updateMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_KEY = #{updateKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, S_DS_ID, T_MD_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TYPE, BUILD_MODE, UPDATE_MODE, UPDATE_KEY from IM_MODEL where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, S_DS_ID, T_MD_ID, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TYPE, BUILD_MODE, UPDATE_MODE, UPDATE_KEY from IM_MODEL
